Title: Bills' Cook takes part in warmups but skips game
Description: Running back James Cook joined the Bills in pregame warmups but declined to play in the team's preseason opener against the Giants Saturday amid his contract dispute, coach Sean McDermott said.

Title: Affordable 3D-printed bionic arm uses muscle signals to move
Description: TrueLimb bionic arms use 3D printing and muscle sensors for personalized prosthetics that respond to user movements with haptic feedback and multi-day battery life.

Description:
